name: Generate Image
description: Generate images from text prompts using AI image generation (DALL-E 3). Creates high-quality images and saves them to storage. Returns storage path for inline rendering.

prompt.description: Detailed text description of the image to generate. Be specific about style, composition, colors, mood, etc.

size.description: Image size/aspect ratio. Square (1024x1024), landscape (1792x1024), or portrait (1024x1792). Default: 1024x1024

quality.description: Image quality. 'standard' is faster and cheaper, 'hd' has finer details. Default: standard

style.description: Visual style. 'vivid' for hyper-real and dramatic, 'natural' for more realistic. Default: vivid

filename.description: Optional: Custom filename (without extension). Auto-generated if not provided.

input.prompt: A serene mountain landscape at sunset with purple and orange skies, photorealistic
